roundStarted:
Starting the #{{round}} round! What is the anime for this Ending / Opening theme? Send in chat the answer! You have {{time}}.
Send **{{prefix}}stop** in the chat if you want to stop the match.
easteregg: You just discovered an easter egg! Your match will start in {{seconds}} seconds.
correctAnswer: Congratulations {{user}}! You got the correct answer!
searchingTheme: Searching for the theme... (it may take a few moments)
waitingStream: Waiting for the stream... (It may take a few seconds.)
winner: {{user}} is the winner of this match! {{prizes}} (Match winners earn extra XP)
levelup: Congratulations {{user}}! You just level up to **{{level}}}**!
forceFinished: This match was ended by force.
roundEnded: All rounds are over! I hope you guys had fun.

errors.noVoiceChannel: You need to be on a voice channel to start a match!
errors.noUsersInVoiceChannel: It seems that there are no more people on the voice channel, ending the match.
errors.fatalError: **Oopsie! It looks like an error occurred while trying to start the round**! {{error}}
errors.streamTimeout: It seems like it took a long time for me to finish loading the stream, maybe I'm a little slow? Please restart the game.
errors.onlyHostCanFinish: Only the one who started the game can finish it.
errors.unavailable: **I'm burning! I am unavailable for new rounds at the moment (probably due to some instability), enter my support server for updates. In the meantime stay with Amelia Watson Vibing.**
